Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +configureWithPublishableKey:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Configure Castle with default configuration using publishable key

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +urlSessionInterceptConfiguration
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Session configuration used to enable the Castle request interceptor.

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +resetConfiguration
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Reset current configuration. Will disable logging, request interception (if enabled).

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +setUserJwt:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Track identify event with specified user id. User jwt will be persisted. A call to identify or reset will clear the stored user identity.

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +screenWithName:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Track screen event with a specified name

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +customWithName:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Track custom event with a specified name

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +customWithName:properties:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Track custom event with a specified name and properties

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +flush
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Force a flush of the event queue, even if the flush limit hasn’t been reached

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +flushIfNeeded:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Force a flush if needed for a specific url, flushes if url is allowlisted

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +reset
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Reset any stored user information and flush the event queue

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +isAllowlistURL:
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Determine if a given url is allowlisted

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +userAgent
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Get the User Agent for used in all requests to the Castle API.

Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.name: +queueSize
Classes/Castle.html#/c:objc(cs)Castle(cm.abstract: Get the current size of the event queue

Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: maxQueueLimit
Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: The upper limit for stored events in the event queue

Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: flushLimit
Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: The number of events stored before flushing the queue

Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: adSupportBlock
Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: Sets a block to be called when IDFA / AdSupport identifier is created.

Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.name: enableAdvertisingTracking
Classes/CastleConfiguration.html#/c:objc.abstract: Whether the analytics client should track advertisting info. YES by default.

Classes/CastleConfiguration.html.name: CastleConfiguration
Classes/CastleConfiguration.html.abstract: This object provides configuration options used to initialize the Castle SDK.

Classes/Castle.html.name: Castle
Classes/Castle.html.abstract: This class is the main entry point for using the Castle SDK and provides methods
